definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 毫[hao2]/archaic variant of 乙[yi3]
Chairman Mao/Mao Zedong 毛澤東|毛泽东 (1893-1976), Chinese Communist leader

sentences.english: This VDC is one where there is a lot of support for the Maoists.
sentences.chinese: 这个VDC里有许多支持毛主义者的人。

sentences.english: Hard, wiry and straight, lying close to the body with a definite undercoat.
sentences.chinese: 刚毛，毛质硬且直，紧贴身体，有一定的底毛。

sentences.english: The matrix, or inferior portion, includes the lowermost part of the follicle and the hair bulb.
sentences.chinese: 毛母质或许下部，包括毛囊的最下部和毛球。

sentences.english: China has benefitted from three major advantages after Mao Zedong's death in 1976.
sentences.chinese: 1976年毛逝世后，中国受益于三大主要优势。

sentences.english: My dog has long, thick hair that habours fleas.
sentences.chinese: 我的狗生有长而厚的毛，易藏跳蚤。

sentences.english: Daqing Longheda Food Co. , Ltd is the first physalis research, manufacturing and the sales enterprise in China.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是中国第一家毛酸浆研究，生产，销售的企业。

sentences.english: Several dead bodies lay under the portrait of Mao on Tiananmen Gate.
sentences.chinese: 几具尸体放置在毛之下画象在天安门门。

sentences.english: At a time when mountain too proud, uncle Mao Qingyuan the late news.
sentences.chinese: 就在高山春风得意之时，大伯毛清源过世的消息传来。

sentences.english: The ear leather is thick, covered with soft short hair, and when measured, should reach the inner corner of the eye.
sentences.chinese: 耳皮丰厚，被软短毛，如测量应可达眼睛内侧角。

sentences.english: Why weren't they all buying gold as soon as the announcement was made?
sentences.chinese: 为毛他们不在公告发出之后第一时间买黄金？

sentences.english: Puma fur was found clinging to bushes.
sentences.chinese: 灌木丛中也发现了粘在上面的美洲狮毛。

sentences.english: Dogs are not to be penalized if shown with a summer coat.
sentences.chinese: 公犬不应为夏季被毛而遭到处罚。

sentences.english: The Eye is where your leader is threaded and tied.
sentences.chinese: 眼就是穿子线绑着毛钩的部位。

sentences.english: Its legs are short and strong with hard hairs.
sentences.chinese: 它的腿又短又强壮，并长有硬毛。
甚至毛也持有类似的观点。

sentences.english: Wow, his feather is gray, it's too rube !
sentences.chinese: 他的毛是灰灰的，太土了。

definition: (pet name for a baby or small child)
white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]
fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
